text: The 2011 Texas Longhorns baseball team represented the University of Texas at Austin in the 2011 NCAA Division I baseball season. The Longhorns played their home games at UFCU Disch-Falk Field. The team was coached by Augie Garrido in his 15th season at Texas. The Longhorns reached the College World Series, but were eliminated by North Carolina. ==Personnel== ===Roster=== {| class="toccolours" style="border-collapse:collapse; font-size:90%;" |- ! colspan=9
